name: Pocket Helicopter Fire War
description:
Pocket Helicopter Fire War is the most intense, adventures and thrilling helicopter transport game you will play. Destructive city environment, transport of army relief and military soldiers is what gonna make you addicted. Complete different missions which require high skills and don't crush your helicopter in hilly and mountainous environment.
Features
Free 3D game
Mountainous hilly environment
Missions to be completed in time
Challenging game play
Real life sound effects
